descriptionHtml:
An easily installed pink miniskirt.

It\'s a retexture of the Tavern Clothes worn by Hroki who is in Markarth at the main square at the entrance or inside the inn.
I made it a bit shorter and changed the color.

Unzip this file here:
%your steam directory%\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\clothes\\wench

That\'s all

After that, next (re)start of skyrim it should work.

The item can be added to your inventory this way:

pres the `/~ key on keyboard to go to console 
enter this line: player.additem 000d191f 1
pres the `/~ key

to add it to a companion:
pres the `/~ key on keyboard to go to console 
click on your companion
enter this line: additem 000d191f 1
pres the `/~ key

It can be enchanted.

caution: all female Tavern Clothes will now look like this but there aren\'t many in the game most females at inns and taverns wear barmaid clothes

1.1: new version which includes the pink boots and should work now with download manager
author: stroot

files.name: Pink skirt and boots for download manager
files.fileName: Pink skirt and boots for download manager-585-1-1.zip
